author: reshm
title: Fact Check for Cardano
description: It is hard to distill through the disinformation related to Cardano and there isn't an easy way to do fact check.
solution: Build a fact check website for Cardano, which can be curated by the community.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus developers, participants of Gimbalabs PPBL, and experienced web developers
